summary: This is an email chain from August 12, 2019, regarding staffing and recruitment efforts at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. It details vacancies, recruitment activities, and administrative processes for hiring Correctional Officers and other positions.

events.title: Career Fair at 290 Broadway
events.description: MCC New York held a career fair at 290 Broadway with 174 potential applicants in attendance.

events.title: Scheduled ICT Class
events.description: An ICT (Institutional Correctional Training) class is scheduled to begin with two Correctional Officers.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email about staffing at MCC New York, dated August 12, 2019.
MCC New York reported 17 correctional officer vacancies and 24 PO1-A positions to fill.
Recruitment efforts included advertising on 97.1 FM, in the NY Times, and in The Chief, plus a career fair on July 30, 2019.
An ICT class was ongoing, and another was scheduled for September 15, 2019.
The email chain involves Human Resource personnel discussing administrative hiring processes and certificate audits.
